other_tests.findings: Trace bilateral pleural effusions with bibasal atelectasis/consolidation. Homogeneous attenuation of the liver parenchyma, bright signal on T2 weighted sequences suggesting some degree of background edema. No periportal edema or focal hepatic lesion. Common bile duct normal in caliber with no filling defect or choledocholithiasis, no fluid collection within the surgical bed suggesting bile leak.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No contrast excretion visualized within the biliary tree, consistent with findings identified on prior HIDA scan.
